name: Pagaloop
headline: Pay, Get Paid and Extend Cash Flow using your Credit Card asâ¦
description:
Pagaloop helps business owners and persons in Latin America pay, get paid and extend cash flow using credit cards to finance expenses like rent, taxes, payroll and suppliers, via an extended network of relevant partnerships (federal/local governments, AMEX, HSBC, schools and universities, etc.). The Company provides a service in which a payment is made to a third party (that would typically not accept credit card as a payment method) in exchange for a fee of 4.7% (+ taxes). Additionally, Pagaloop offers payments in 3, 6, 9 or 12
months with an extremely accessible commission. All of those solutions without taking any underwriting risk, which remains at the issuer of the credit line.

founders.name: Gerardo Briones, Founder
founders.description:
Founder & CEO of Pagaloop (YC W21). I've been building companies for 15+ years, my past ventures include companies in media, telecom and HR tech. 

I like building companies and among my strengths, I can stress my perseverance and determination, I have created three companies related to technology.  I Studied at HBS and MIT.

founders.name: Carlos Cruz, Founder
founders.description:
+10 year experience in Software / Product development Tech Manager. 
Third time as a Tech Startup CTO. 
MBA.

founders.name: LUIS FERNANDO DOSAL G, Founder
founders.description:
15+ Year experience serial entrepreneur
Chemical Engenieer
Executive education in HBS

Quienes confían en nosotros
## Quienes confían en nosotros
Quienes confían en nosotros
## Razones para usar Pagaloop
## Razones para usar Pagaloop
### Pagos y cobros inmediatos 24/7
### Pagos y cobros inmediatos 24/7
Manda dinero 24/7 sin necesidad de aprobaciones o nuevos créditos, paga lo que quieras, aunque no acepten TDC
Manda dinero 24/7 sin necesidad de aprobaciones o nuevos créditos, paga lo que quieras, aunque no acepten TDC
### Todos tus datos están asegurados con nosotros
Tienes el respaldo de nuestras certificaciones nacionales e internacionales para el cuidado de información y prevención de fraudes.
Además, reemplazamos los datos de tu TDC con un token o código único.
### Difiere tu pago a meses
Difiere tus pagos a 3, 6, 9 ó 12 meses.
Desde la app, tú decides qué plazo quieres poner para liquidar el gasto, o bien, ofrecerle a tus clientes una opción a meses para el pago más ágil. 
### Grandes beneficios dentro de nuestra aplicación
Al usar tus TDC en Pagaloop, no pierdes, al contrario, sigues ganando los beneficios que otorga el banco emisor de la tarjeta, como puntos, millas, premios y cashback, entre otros. Además Pagaloop también recompensa tu fidelidad.
### Transacciones más seguras
Olvídate de fraudes, o no saber cómo se están usando tus tarjetas. Tienes visibilidad de todos los pagos
### Difiere tu pago a meses
Difiere tus pagos a 3, 6, 9 ó 12 meses.
Desde la app, tú decides qué plazo quieres poner para liquidar el gasto, o bien, ofrecerle a tus clientes una opción a meses para el pago más ágil. 
### Grandes beneficios dentro de nuestra aplicación
Al usar tus TDC en Pagaloop, sigues ganando los beneficios que otorga el banco emisor de la tarjeta, como puntos, millas, premios y cashback, entre otros. Además Pagaloop también recompensa tu fidelidad.

generated_description:
**Pagaloop: Revolutionizing Payments in Latin America**

Founded in 2020, Pagaloop is a Mexico City-based fintech company that emerged from the Y Combinator W21 batch, led by a team of 23 passionate employees. The company’s mission is straightforward: to help individuals and businesses in Latin America efficiently pay, get paid, and extend their cash flow, all while leveraging their credit cards.

At its core, Pagaloop addresses a critical challenge—many local businesses don't accept credit cards, limiting payment flexibility. To circumvent this, Pagaloop allows users to make payments to these third parties by charging a 4.7% fee (plus taxes). Not only does this service facilitate payments for essential expenses like rent, taxes, payroll, and supplies, but it also offers flexible payment plans—3, 6, 9, or 12 months—without taking on underwriting risk.

### Why Pagaloop Stands Out

1. **Flexible Payment Options**: Users can spread their payments over several months, which is a major win for cash flow management.
   
2. **Immediate Liquidity**: Pagaloop transforms credit card spending into immediate cash flow, making it possible to fulfill financial obligations without hassle.

3. **No Underwriting Risk**: The company doesn’t take on the repayment risk; instead, it relies on the credit card issuer to handle that.

4. **Strong Partnerships**: Pagaloop collaborates with a network of partners, including federal and local governments and major financial institutions like AMEX and HSBC, enhancing its credibility and reach.

5. **Robust Security**: Their technology ensures that all transactions are secure, utilizing tokenization to protect users' sensitive data.

6. **Loyalty Benefits**: Users continue to receive benefits from their credit card providers—like points and cash back—while using Pagaloop.

By simplifying the payment process, Pagaloop is making waves in the Latin American fintech scene, offering businesses and individuals unprecedented flexibility and control over their finances.

To learn more or start using the service, visit [Pagaloop's website](https://www.pagaloop.com). Whether you're paying suppliers, settling taxes, or managing payroll, Pagaloop empowers users to leverage their credit cards creatively—because your money should work for you, not the other way around.
